title: WTB/WTTF: Graded (low grades only) Cy Young / Ty Cobb
author: sterlingfox

posts.post_title: WTB/WTTF: Graded (low grades only) Cy Young / Ty Cobb
posts.post_content:
As I get closer to completing my HOF collection, these remain on my want list who have tobacco cards available:

[STRIKE]Christy Mathewson[/STRIKE] ACQUIRED
[STRIKE]Walter Johnson[/STRIKE] ACQUIRED
Cy Young
Ty Cobb

I'm looking for PSA/SGC (will also consider BVG) low grades of T202/T205/etc. No T201's, please. Also, no raw.

Here is my trade list [url]http://sterlingsvintagecards.blogspot.com/p/blog-page.html[/url]

Please send pics and prices to [url]drubitd@gmail.com[/url] (or PM)

I have a Matty T205 that is raw but would probably grade 1 or 1.5. Not destroyed, but thorough creasing.  A very presentable low grade card.  You can see it here:

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/1911-t205-Gold-Border-Christy-Mathewson-New-York-Giants-Hall-of-Famer-Fair-/291856826871?ssPageName=STRK:MESE:IT[/url]

My off ebay price would be $210. paypal goods and services NOT friends and family.
